name: Midnight Mauve Eyeshadow
description:
Smoky Sparkle Purple

2g
Ingredients: mica, CI77891

Blending is one of the fantastic benefits of minerals, you can create your own colour palate by mixing different shades and you can use these colours either wet or dry to create different effects.

name: Winter Bloom For fair skin with medium-beige undertone
description:
10g
Mica CI77018, Zinc Oxide. May Contain: CI77007, CI77491, CI77499, CI77891

100% mineral sheer glow foundation, free from fillers, chemicals or preservatives. It provides flawless coverage and also helps to prevent skin irritation, allergies and clogged pores. It gives you a natural and luminous look whatever your skin type, for a radiant complexion. 
Our foundations are weightless and make the skin feel soft and smooth with a silky-finish.
Apply the powder after your moisturizer  is dry.

name: Santorini Bronzer
description:
Deep Tan Bronzer

100% mineral bronzer provides a weightless longlasting tan effect. It is perfect for sensitive skin and give flawless coverage. It creates a shimmering summery glow that highlights the natural curves of the face rather than flattening them out. 

Note: Only apply when your moisturiser is dry.

10g
Ingredients: Mica, May contain: CI77019, CI77891, CI77491, CI77492, CI77499, CI77510, CI77007.

name: Mistral
description:
For peach cheeks. 

A good blusher plays a key role in giving you a fresh, healthy and vibrant appearance. You can use it to highlight your natural features or as a distinctive fashion or a vintage look. 100% mineral, our blushers are particularly suitable for sensitive skin. 


5g
Ingredients: Mica CI77019, Titanium Dioxide. May contain: CI77891, CI77491, CI77492, CI77499.

name: Portobello Concealer
description:
Fair

5g
Ingredients: Mica CI 77019. Titanium Dioxide. may contain: CI 77891, CI77491, CI77492, CI77499

Concealer is more dense than foundation, allowing fuller coverage of trouble spots and hyperpigmentation (red areas). 
It can be used over foundation or on it own, and has greater staying power.

name: Set Of Brushes FREE DELIVERY
description:
Applying make-up with the right brushes can make the difference in the final look. Our brushes are conceived to perform the best result for mineral loose powder. They are all made with natural hair. If treated with care they can be lifelong lasting. Wash them with gentle cleanser and let them dry flat after dab them with a towel. 

For mineral Foundation and Finish Powder use our Kabuky Brush or our Powder Brush. Made with goat hair, they are large dence, fluffy, for a flowless result and an airbrushed finish.

For blusher use out Blush Brush. 

For Concealer use our medim sable brush.

For Eyeshasow and eyelight use either small and medium sable blushes.

For Lips use out portable, retractable sable brush.

name: Kabuky Brush
description:
Fluffy dense kabuky brush made with goat hair. Use it for a perfect flowless foundation or a finish powder arbrushed affect. 

Applying make-up with the right brushes can make the difference in the final look. Our brushes are conceived to perform the best result for mineral loose powder. They are all made with natural hair. If treated with care they can be lifelong lasting. Wash them with gentle cleanser and let them dry flat after dab them with a towel.
